snippet.title: A story told by the stars - Trailer
snippet.description:
A&LGames presents to you A story told by the stars, a free and short visual novel telling the story of Mark and Ansel, two young men on a special academy to become rulers of their city.

The game will be available on the 17/03/23, on our itch.io: https://algames-0.itch.io/
For more updates on this and future projects, you can check us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ALGames_0

The following music was used:
Touching Moments One - Pulse by Kevin MacLeod
Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4537-touching-moments-one-pulse
License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
